Class PoolBall

java.lang.Object
Ball
PoolBall
public class PoolBall
extends Ball

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PoolBall​(double x, double y, double diameter, java.lang.String col)
    PoolBall constructor builds a PoolBall using the constructor from the super class ball, as is shown below in the super statement.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void launchBall​(Line aim, double power)
    Used for launching the white ball based on the aim
    void move​(double dx, double dy)
    Simple movement method, moves dx in the x axis and dy in the y axis.

  • Constructor Details

    • PoolBall

      public PoolBall​(double x, double y, double diameter, java.lang.String col)
      PoolBall constructor builds a PoolBall using the constructor from the super class ball, as is shown below in the super statement.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the ball
      y - y coordinate of the ball
      diameter - diameter of the ball
      col - colour of the ball

  • Method Details

    • launchBall

      public void launchBall​(Line aim, double power)
      Used for launching the white ball based on the aim
      Parameters:
      aim - line used to aim
      power - power the user wishes to launch the ball with

    • move

      public void move​(double dx, double dy)
      Simple movement method, moves dx in the x axis and dy in the y axis. However this movement method accounts for friction.
